name: Secret Poison Needle
outcome: [AttackerName] skillfully pricks [TargetName]'s neck with a sinister-looking needle!
miss: [AttackerName] tries to sting [TargetName] with a needle, but [TargetHeOrShe] keeps away.
statusOutcome: [TargetName]'s body rapidly becomes numb! [TargetName] is paralyzed and crumples to the ground!
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] desperately tries to move his body!
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] struggles to move his body while moaning pathetically!
